title.value: SNOMED CT Implementation Guide for FHIR

description.value: Describes how to use SNOMED CT in FHIR
Profile of Allergy Intolerance resource with bindings to SNOMED CT Clinical findings as well as additional constraints to avoid overlap with the binding.
Profile of Allergy Intolerance resource with bindings to SNOMED CT Substances as well as additional constraints to avoid overlap with the binding.
Profile of HL7 BMI profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.
Profile of HL7 blood pressure profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.
Profile of HL7 body height profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.
Profile of HL7 body temperature profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.
Profile of HL7 body weight profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.
Profile of HL7 head circumference profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.
Profile of HL7 heart rate profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.
Profile of HL7 oxygen saturation profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.
Profile of HL7 respiratory rate profile with SNOMED CT binding in addition to 'magic number' binding from base profile.
A profile of the Specimen resource for use with SNOMED CT coding.

This value set contains concept codes for allergy or intolerance clinical findings. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) where concept is-a 420134006 | Propensity to adverse reaction (finding) |
This value set contains concept codes for BMI observable entities. It includes the single code from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) 60621009 | Body mass index (observable entity) |

This value set contains concept codes for body height observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint << 248334005 | Length of body (observable entity) |

name.value: Core body temperature Observable entity Code

description.value: This value set contains concept codes for core body temperature observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint << 276885007 | Core body temperature (observable entity) |

This value set contains concept codes for body weight observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint (<< 27113001 | Body weight (observable entity) | MINUS (<< 248350002 | Reference weight (observable entity) | OR << 301334000 | Birth weight centile (observable entity) |))

name.value: Diastolic blood pressure Observable entity Code

description.value: This value set contains concept codes for diastolic blood pressure observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint (<< 271650006 | Diastolic blood pressure (observable entity) | MINUS (<< 314465004 | 24 hour diastolic blood pressure (observable entity) | OR << 716632005 | Baseline diastolic blood pressure (observable entity) | OR << 315613000 | Target diastolic blood pressure (observable entity) |))

This value set contains concept codes for head circumference observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint (<< 363812007 | Head circumference (observable entity) | MINUS << 248397001 | Head circumference centile (observable entity) |)

This value set contains concept codes for heart rate observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint (<< 364075005 | Heart rate (observable entity) | MINUS 428420003 | Target heart rate (observable entity) |)

name.value: Peripehral oxygen saturation Observable entity Code

description.value: This value set contains concept codes for peripheral oxygen saturation observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint <<431314004 | Peripheral oxygen saturation (observable entity) |

This value set contains concept codes for respiratory rate observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint << 86290005 | Respiratory rate (observable entity) |

name.value: Systolic blood pressure Observable entity Code

description.value: This value set contains concept codes for systolic blood pressure observable entities. It includes codes from [SNOMED](http://snomed.info/sct) meeting the constraint (<< 271649006 | Systolic blood pressure (observable entity) | MINUS (<< 314464000 | 24 hour systolic blood pressure (observable entity) | OR << 716579001 | Baseline systolic blood pressure (observable entity) | OR << 315612005 | Target systolic blood pressure (observable entity) |))
Codes describing the specimen collcetion bodysite.
Codes describing the specimen collection method.
Codes describing the specimen processing procedure.
Codes describing the type of specimen.
